author: Special Correspondent
text:
The 12{+t}{+h}year Radhakalyana Mahotsavam and Namasankeerthana Vaibhavam by Asthiga Samaja will be held on the samajam premises at Edayarpalayam from January 18 to 24.

The week-long events include Veda parayanam, renditions of Thiruppugazh, Ashtapadi, Narayaneeyam, Bhadrachala Ramads, Purandaradas Devaranama and Oothukkadu Venkatakavi’s compositions by prominent Bhagavathars in the morning and afternoon sessions.

Anjaneya Utsavam by T. Vijayakrishnan Bhagavathar and party will be held on January 24. For further details, call 96006-74420 and 98431-71652.
title: Mahotsavam from Jan. 18
